#labels Featured
Kostyuchenko A., Lanin M., Kritskaya S. and Azemsha T. present 
     = Andrico Project =

ANDRICO - is a program product, developed for devices based on Android OS, that enables users to download contacts of Facebook friends to the device


= What is ANRICO consist of? =

 * Application logging in the Facebook and downloading contacts of friends
 * Content Provider storing the contacts downloaded from Facebook
 * Application displaying, sorting out and filtering downloaded data


= Who can use ANDRICO =
 * Owners of Android based devices can use it to simplify addition and update of contacts
 * Developers can use the Content Provider to develop their own applications, such as radar displaying places of domicile and place of employment on the map and so on
